hadiths.text: Narrated Nafi`:`Abdullah (bin `Umar), used to slaughter (his sacrifice) at the Manhar. ('Ubaidullah, a sub-narrator said, "The Manhar of Allah's Messenger (ﷺ)

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّحْرِ فِي مَنْحَرِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم بِمِنًى
chapter.eng-name: To slaughter at the Manhar at Mina
